thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Finland's Solidium sells Telia stake for 5.1 bln SEK

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Finland's Solidium sells Telia stake for 5.1 bln SEK
text:
HELSINKI, Feb 8 (Reuters) - The Finnish government’s Solidium investment arm has sold its 3.2 percent stake in Swedish telecoms company Telia for 5.1 billion Swedish crowns ($631.95 million), it said on Thursday.
The holdings were sold at a price of SEK 37.32 per share to institutional investors, a slight discount to Wednesday’s SEK 37.68 closing price, and Solidium no longer owns any Telia shares.
Solidium mainly holds stakes in listed Finnish companies that are considered nationally important. ($1 = 8.0702 Swedish crowns) (Reporting by Tuomas Forsell, editing by Terje Solsvik)
